Replace.Text: Yes, I believe we will become good friends.
I really hope to be your friend, but I'm sorry, it's not the right time yet.
Would you be willing to announce to others that we have become friends?
Great, from today on, we will truly become friends.
A surprising choice, I hope you won't regret it.
Very good, your failure will become the nourishment for the prosperity of Leithanien.
I'm sorry, but your demise is necessary for Leithanien.
Oh, Leithanien, there will also be a day of silence
Excellent strategy, I look forward to you bringing the same ending to others.
Your delegation will linger on the elegant streets of Zwillingstürme.
I understand your kindness, but now is not the time.
The envoys of Leithanien have brought you beautiful music and poetry, and I hope you will not reject their kindness.
It's a pity, I thought you would be a more rational person.
Your callousness even surpasses that of the Witch King, and under your leadership, your people will only perish on their own![NEWLINE](Denounces You)
Lieselotte Ivegnade, the 'Eternal Grace' of Leithanien. We welcome anyone willing to join hands with Leithaniento build a civilized country for the future.
Believe me, the scenery of Leithanien will not disappoint you.
Thank you for your enthusiasm, we will definitely go and take a look.
Zwillingstürme rebuilt two magnificent towers after the war. If you are interested, you must not miss them.
May you be well, is there anything I can help you with?
Your existence will create prosperity for the world!
(You peacefully develop the cultural industry)
You have disrupted the main melody of the world.
(You are lack of culture)
Leithanien thinks you would be a valuable ally. What do you think?
Is war always boring?
Relax, calm down, and accept your fate with peace of mind.
This war has already prevented both sides from gaining more benefits, let's call it a day.
No problem, but please don't delay too long within the borders of Leithanien.
Sorry, Leithanien does not welcome foreign armies.
Our army is just taking a shortcut and will leave soon. You wouldn't disagree, would you?
Don't expect to attack Leithanien, the Golden Bull Guards are ready to go.
This transaction contributes to the common prosperity of both parties.
I don't see any benefits for Leithanien from this transaction.
The White Queen is very pleased with your peaceful development of the cultural industry
The White Queen hates your cultural backwardness
I'm not very good at dealing with people, but I will make sure they are treated with respect.
Leithanian ruthless authority does not require friends.
Friend is a very unfamiliar concept to me, but I think you can be called my friend now.
Very good, I believe we will have a great time working together in the future.
Okay, maybe we can talk about it later.
I, the Sword of Leithanien, declare here: You will never be able to enter my kingdom.
Your presence has posed a threat to Leithanien, and I cannot sit idly by.
No matter how powerful the king is, there will still be a day when it becomes history.
I defeated Herkunftshorn, and you defeated me. So, you must step into a realm that none of us have yet reached.
I'm not very good at dealing with people, but I will make sure they are treated with respect.
There's no need for that.
Leithanien hopes to establish further contact with your side.
There are many people who fear and hate me, but there are not many who have the courage like you.
If you have no respect for Leithanien, my sword will pierce through your heart.[NEWLINE](Denounces You)
Helinmat Hildegard, Queen of Leithanien. But for those who plotted against Letianatu, the term 'Ruthless Authority' is more familiar.
Leithanien is a beautiful country, welcome to our city.
Well, if there's a chance, I'll go take a look.
Behind the tower of Zwillingstürme lies a profound history... Does your capital share the same heritage?
Hello. I came specifically to visit. Is there anything important to discuss?
Thank you for your contribution to the world order.
(You cleared the barbarian outpost)
How could you let those barbarians act recklessly?
(You allow barbarians to plunder)
I alone may not be able to protect Leithanien well. Would you be willing to help me?
Cherish this hard-earned peace.
You offended Leithanien, but still want to escape unscathed?
For Leithanien, the bloodshed was worth it... but it was already enough.
No problem, your troops can pass through, but go back quickly.
The borders of Leithanien are not open to unfamiliar armed groups.
Can my troops use this opportunity? This is purely for tactical considerations.
The idea of a surprise attack is great, but it doesn't work for me.
In my opinion, this will benefit both of us
The price you quoted is too low, think again.
The Black Queen is satisfied with your cleaning up of the barbarian tribe
The Black Queen hates you for allowing barbarians to plunder
Not many people can call me a friend. Fremont... and you.
Why do you think you are qualified to be my friend?
Leithanien's friendship is precious, accept it, don't waste it.
I hope you won't disappoint Leithanien.
You will eventually realize how foolish it was to reject Leithanien's friendship.
I crushed Corsica I and Gaul, and you actually thought you could survive under my command?
I, the King of Leithanien, declare here: Your kingdom will be reduced to ashes like Lingongs!
These common people simply don't understand... where the biggest threat lies
Brilliant as Leithanien, can't it be eternal
Please rest assured that these envoys will not be turned into sculptures before your country makes rude actions.
Why waste my time killing these insects?
Leithanien believes that communication with your side will be greatly beneficial.
Arrogance comes at a cost.
When I searched through all the golden bull and codes, I found that you were already beyond redemption, and your fate had only one dead end![NEWLINE](Denounces You)
I am Herkunftshorn, the emperor of Leithanien and the king of sorcerers. Who is standing in front of me again?
If you depart from Vedunien now, you should not miss the concert at the Hall.
Musicians and scholars in Leithanien would be very interested.
The high tower of Victoria can leave a deep impression on you, and of course, we also hope to visit your country.
Please feel free, but don't disturb me. Modifying the Golden Melody movement cannot be neglected.
The ancient mysteries in the classics will be renewed by you.
(You have a high yield of faith)
No matter how ignorant the refugees are, they cannot compare to your emptiness and clumsiness.
(You are low in faith)
Just like the Battle of the Four Emperors, our alliance will sweep away all enemies.
You'd better hope that we won't have the day to go to war again.
Your empire will be buried with Gaul!
The more urgent threat I am facing does not allow me to set my sights on you anymore.
I allow your troops to pass, but with respect.
Why should I let your troops set foot on the border of Leithanien?
In order to achieve their goals, the army of Leithanien needs to pass through your borders.
Surprise War? The idea is great, but Leithanien is particularly skilled at crushing it.
For the prosperity of Leithanien, I accept these suggestions.
Do you think I would sacrifice Leithanien's interests?
Herkunftshorn likes your emphasis on faith
Herkunftshorn hates you for turning a blind eye to faith

Count Utica was afraid of being swallowed up by the Witch King and had to use the power inherited from him, but he was already dead. Now I am first and foremost your friend, and only then a poor replica of the Witch King, that's enough.
Friendship? Please forgive me for refusing. No, it's not that I don't need it, but I don't know whether it's me who's being recognized or someone who's living in my body The relics of the Witch King?
As agreed beforehand, I have no experience as a good friend, so I won't do anything to avoid causing any trouble for you.
Is this all agreed upon? You are really generous, it seems that I underestimated you.
Okay, as expected. I didn't expect any good response from you in the first place.
I'm not timid. Do you know that the dice in my hand once destroyed an entire main fleet of Gaul? Be careful of the music on the battlefield, especially when facing the Leithanienns.
Long spells can cause headaches and even hallucinations when I'm unlucky, so let's make a quick decision.
Practice is not enough It's nothing, just a phrase I used to hear a lot recently, don't mind Damn it, doesn't that mean he's right?

If there is a lack of an admirer who applauds and shouts' encore 'at the same time, then let me be that person. Congratulations, respected Mr. Winner. You defeated the Count of Utica and also defeated the remnants of the Witch King.

At night, the top of Utica's tower is also a great place to enjoy the breeze. I used to fantasize about how happy life was on the ground, but later I realized that the only thing I was deprived of on the tower was freedom, while there were more people on the earth who had nothing but freedom.

Are you going to send someone to Leithanien and learn the social etiquette of Leithanien nobles? Ha, the knowledge here is too vast. Whether it's the etiquette of getting rid of the entanglement of commoners or the etiquette of spreading rumors about other nobles behind their backs, it requires a thick skin, which is a bit difficult for me. You'd better find another way to handle it.
I can finally step into the outside world. Although I haven't brought you many gifts, you won't refuse the small kindness of the poor Count Utica, right?
Save it, your curses are not as sharp as one thousandth of the sound in my mind every day. They have no effect except wasting your saliva and making you look like a clown.
I used to think that the Witch King in my mind was the most annoying guy in the world, but thank you for letting me realize that I was wrong.[NEWLINE](Denounces You)

Ebenholz, Count Utica, the king of Leithanien who had to take responsibility. There are always people who like to bind me and Utica's previous owner together, it's not their fault, but I just want to be an ordinary infected person who hates inequality Performance? Maybe. But even if it's acting, I have to continue playing myself like this until the last moment.
I'm not sure if Leithanien is better or worse under my rule, perhaps an outsider's perspective would provide some valuable insights?
This place is far from the tower of Leithanien, but I still prefer the feeling of standing on the ground.
When I was in Utica, every day passed slowly, but if you had to come, I couldn't refuse either.
Hey, my brain's hurting. Wait a moment, according to experience, it will be fine in two more minutes.
Thank you for giving me enough space. I have always liked someone.
(You are far away from the city with black keys)
Get out of my room!
(You are approaching the kingdom of black keys)
If a mediocre person like me could benefit your career, that would be even better.
You're lucky, the voice in my head keeps shouting to fight to the end, so I've decided to go against it.
I don't like to exterminate, but you don't deserve me to grant mercy beyond the law.
Have you beat enough? Anyway, we can't do anything about each other, how about this?
Okay, really. If you don't mind Leithanian detestable aristocrats and hypocritical social rhetoric, why should I stop you?

Do you want to visit Leithanien? Oh, that's a good place. The queen treats her subjects like children, healthy people like siblings, and people's faces are filled with happiness - fake? Fake is right. Wait until you can listen to this without changing your face before considering going to Leithanien.
Sometimes, it's too selfish for me to go out for a walk alone. Well, to be honest, my army has to pass through you.
That old thing in my mind is already annoying enough, please don't bother me anymore, okay?
Trading, this is really fresh. Okay, I agree.
This result cannot be considered good. Did it not be me who just had a headache, but you?
Ebenholz is very satisfied with you staying away from his homeland
Ebenholz hates you for expanding the war into his kingdom
I can feel the stiffness of your fingers, it seems that you are not used to this kind of relationship yet. Don't be nervous, I will take you with me
If you want to become friends with me, what you have done now is far from enough.
Even without relying on the connection of the music, you still understand me more and more. But how can I share the joy in my heart with you?
You are indeed the person who understands my inner voice the most
How can I convey my emotions to you?
War itself is not worth playing. But I will listen to every voice on the battlefield, whether they come from heroes or refugees.
I am not interested in the means of harming others, but you are an irresistible temptation to me.
The song ends and the people disperse. How long can the vibration of the strings last after the performance is over?
No matter how strong the soul is, it cannot conquer the destined extinction. But since you have conquered me, I expect you to have a different performance.
I will prepare a unique concert for them.
I've heard too much noise already... Can you please let me be quiet for a while?
They cannot play music like mine, but they are equally skilled. I hope you are satisfied.
Even if it's your request, I won't stop playing. Trauma is one thing, freedom is another. My life, like any other life, will come to an end once it stagnates.
Would you also refuse to listen to the most genuine voice?[NEWLINE](Denounces You)

The sinner of Lateran, later a saint, a guest of honor to the nobles of Leithanien, Alturo. I should have introduced myself through music. Unfortunately, it may be impolite to play for you rashly, so please forgive me for my cumbersome self introduction.
Perhaps our own distance should be closer, don't you think?
In this way, the distance between us has been further increased.
Do you want to know my recent residence? I can tell you. But you also need to tell me.
The strings are vibrating. All for you.
Do what you want, I will pluck the strings for you.
(You are fighting against civilizations outside of Arturia)
Release your voice and conquer those who rebel. My strings will immediately play for you.
(You have no disputes with any major civilizations)
No one has ever walked into my music and thoughts like you. Since that's the case, why don't you take my hand and move forward together?
I would rather play the cloud drifting across the sky than war.
You haven't satisfied me yet
Don't you think it's time to stop this absurd play?
Be careful, I don't want your army to get lost in the music while passing by.
Sorry, their voices are too loud.
Please don't misunderstand, we were just passing by.
Your army's voice doesn't attract me as much as yours, please let them leave.
The strings are playing, to thank you
I don't like your cautious probing like this
Arturia enjoys watching your wars with others
Arturia dislikes the plainness and silence of your empire
Well, speaking of which, who were your former friends? I have no intention of inquiring about anything, but now Viviana, besides quietly discussing poetry with you, can do very little.
Sorry, but I hope we can get to know each other better before considering this issue.
How long will you stop in a small alley where marigolds bloom? Few people write about those staggered flowers, but they are really beautiful

Look, what is the candlelight shining on at this moment? Our faces, these unattended poems, the dark and muddy road ahead? You could have seen these clearly, right? In that case, pay attention to me and don't be distracted by its brightness.
I will be filled with anticipation for this unfinished poem.
Viviana Droste will win with her candle and sword.
I really don't want things to come to this point, but your poetry must stop here.
Some poems that are criticized as mediocre also contain touching sentences. I regret the author's technique, but I cannot disagree with their expression.
Whether in competition or war, victory or defeat is a common occurrence among soldiers. But at least, I was defeated in your hands.
I cannot guarantee that I will receive them properly, but I will do my best.
Hmm? delegation? They always make me think of Kazimir's manager, sorry
I am full of longing for your city. Would you be willing to satisfy Viviana's curiosity?
How could you say such despicable words?
You are on an incorrect path, please return to the wrong path as soon as possible[NEWLINE](Denounces You)
Viviana Droste, the people of Casimir like to call me the 'Candle Knight', but now I represent Leithanien. I heard Margaret mention you before, and finally met you today.
If possible, I would like to schedule a time with you to go around the city together
Is this considered a date? Just kidding... but is this considered a date really?
Very good, so who are we going to go to whose side?
My days are clear, my nights are happy.
The bright sunshine, carefully decorated garden, and profound poetry, both you and I follow.
(You have high culture or many great works)
I will illuminate your path with candlelight, repent, you should pursue a better soul.
(You are low in culture)
I have been silently watching your figure. But now, Viviana doesn't want to just watch anymore. Excuse me, can we walk side by side?
Are you exhausted already? Me too. The last time I experienced such an unforgettable battle was in the game led by the Grand Knight.
This battle must have one person fall to end.
This is not an arena, the scars are not worth recording and praising.
Just help yourself.
Seeing foreign armies at my doorstep reminds me of bad things
I really just need to go through it temporarily, please trust me, okay?
Your army makes me feel uneasy. Leave, this is the last piece of advice.
Viviana has brought you a gift. Although that's the case, it still requires mutual exchange.
I'm not very interested in this, can you reconsider?
Viviana likes you to immerse yourself in culture and literature
Viviana dislikes your lower cultural level
